pages.title: Ritual Introduction
pages.text: $(l:e_item_magic_sigil)Magic Sigils/el have the ability to store complicated instructions that are often used in $(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el. These Rituals can be used for various things. The easiest Ritual you can perform is summoning a $(l:e_entity_demon)Demon/el. Since the only useful thing you can get from a Demon is the loot when killing him,

you might want to perform other $(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el that can make your life easier. Unfortunately these $(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el require some rare resources you can only get in the $(l:e_dimension_depth_dimension)Depth dimension/el, so you might want to travel there first (Introduced in '$(l:e_advanced_dimensional_travel)Dimensional Travel/el')./br1After you gathered all the resources you need, you can start crafting advanced $(l:e_ritual_overview)Rituals/el.
